accidents: Accidents, Surgeries, Cancer treatments, All need blood. Every single day. Be someone’s miracle.
connecting: Connecting donors and recipients to save lives — every match brings hope and healing.
name: Name
3-15_char: 3–15 chars, start with letter, letters/numbers/_ only
password_validation: Min 8 chars, include uppercase, lowercase, number & symbol.
address_must_be: Address must be at least 5 characters long
we're: We’re committed to assisting you anytime, day or night — every request counts. Whether you’re a donor or someone in need, your concerns are our top priority.
speak_directly: Speak directly with our support team.
about_para_1: Welcome to DonorCircle — a platform created to connect blood donors with those in need. We believe that a single donation can save multiple lives, and our mission is to make the process of finding and contacting donors simple, fast, and reliable.
about_para_2: At DonorCircle, donors can easily register their details, and people in need can directly reach out to them without any middleman. We aim to build a community of responsible donors and create a network where help is always just a click away.
tag_line: Together, we can make a difference and give the gift of life.
